bool.title: Yes/no habits
bool.text: To track your Yes/no habit, just click/touch on the cell and make it green if you completed it, red if you did not and empty if you want to ignore it. On the extreme right, you can see an average of completion of your daily habit.

text.title: Text habits
text.text: To track your text habit, just click/touch on the cell and use the text area to write anything you want !

number.title: Numeric habits
number.text: To track your numeric habit, just click/touch on the cell and enter a number.

add.title: Track a new habit
add.text: To track a new habit, select the type of habit you want to track, give it a name and start to track it !

manage.title: Move, rename or delete an habit
manage.text: If you want to move, rename or delete an habit, right click or hold down on the name of the habit until you see the menu to manage the habit.
